info.title: UVB Radiation

sensor.radiation.uvb.description: This Resource specifies UV radiation measurement. The Property "measurement" is the current measured UVB. The intensity of UV radiation is measured in the units of milliwatts per square centimeter (mW/cm2) which is energy per square centimeter received per second. UVB is measured between 280 and 315 nanometers in the electromagnetic spectrum.
